product_name: Amphipod Vizlet Flashing LED Reflectors - Yellow - Package of 2
long_description: Attach the Amphipod Vizlet(TM) Flashing LED reflectors to a hat, shirt sleeve, backpack strap or waistband to increase your visibility during nighttime bike rides and runs. Reflectors combine high-brilliance reflectivity with flashing red LEDs for excellent visibility; simple pushbutton on/off switch controls the LEDs. Magnets allow you to easily clip the reflectors to a hat, shirt sleeve, backpack strap or waistband. Amphipod Vizlet Flashing LED reflectors operate on 1 replaceable CR2032 battery each (included). Includes 2 reflectors.
short_description: Attach the Amphipod Vizlet(TM) Flashing LED reflectors to a hat, shirt sleeve, backpack strap or waistband to increase your visibility during nighttime bike rides and runs.
